articles.title: Explained: Transplant recipients remain vulnerable to Covid-19 even after two vaccine doses - The Indian Express
articles.description: This is a follow-up study to an earlier one published in March in JAMA, in which the researchers reported that only 17% of the participating transplant recipients produced sufficient antibodies after just one dose of a two-dose Covid-19 vaccine regimen.
articles.content: In a study published in JAMA, Johns Hopkins Medicine researchers have concluded that although two doses of a coronavirus vaccine confers some protection for people who have received solid organ trans… [+2499 chars]
